title: Birthday Burglar
description: Jamie was the captain of his high school's football team. Neil was the weird goth transfer student. And yet, they fell in love and have been together ever since. Three years later, their relationship is strong as ever, but living together made the couple's love life somewhat predictable.Today, it's Neil's birthday and Jamie's determined to make it unforgettable. And what could make his boyfriend happier than an unexpected sexual role play? Probably only a Bull in the closet.WARNING: Contains graphic m/m sex scenes, failed role play and a chocolate orgasm.~6000 words
author: K.A. Merikan
